Cricket Wireless Pros

  • Same AT&T network coverage
  • Physical stores for support
  • Multi-line discounts

Cricket Wireless Cons

  • 5G costs extra
  • Data always deprioritized vs AT&T postpaid
  • Higher unlimited plan prices

Why Choose Vouch Mobile Over Cricket Wireless?

  • 5G included at no extra cost
  • Lower price for comparable unlimited plan
  • Same AT&T coverage for less money
  • Simpler pricing structure

The Verdict

While Cricket Wireless has its strengths, Vouch Mobile offers a compelling alternative with straightforward $30/month pricing on AT&T's reliable network. With no credit check required, no contracts, and 5G included at no extra cost, Vouch Mobile is the smarter choice for budget-conscious consumers who don't want to sacrifice network quality.

Ready to Switch from Cricket Wireless?
